readable.title: 3136674757_57406c305c
readable.content: An older man in a tank top and a younger girl in striped shirt pose on a couch . An older man is hugging a younger girl . An old man and a young woman embrace on a couch . An old man is hugging a woman in a red striped top on the couch . An old man is hugging the young girl wearing a red striped shirt .
